content: Hi, I'm getting an error on Install Bibtool on #12394, is this related to my PR or a technical difficulty?
Not your fault. I hope retrying works
Josha Dekker has marked this topic as resolved.
This seems to be consistently broken for the past 22 minutes: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/workflows/lint_and_suggest_pr.yml
Ruben Van de Velde has marked this topic as unresolved.
This will block everything right now; I hope someone is getting paged and fixing it - otherwise we can disable the bibfile formatting temporarily
Oh nice, bors still works - presumably the hoskinson runners already have bibtool installed?

For the record: this seems to be resolved now. (I have no idea why, but am happy to hear so...)
All recent PRs marked awaiting-review have had their failing linter jobs re-triggered.
